descript.abstract: Special-purpose districts that serve to operate the local public primary and secondary schools in the Portland metropolitan region. These data are not attendence areas for the local schools.
descript.supplinf: DistInstID and NCESDistID fields link to state and national databases, making it possible to link to external data (e.g. enrollment or operation costs). See http://www.ode.state.or.us/search/results/?id=219 and http://nces.ed.gov/datatools/index.asp?DataToolSectionID=4.

idinfo.useconst: For product terms and conditions, please see http://www.oregonmetro.gov/index.cfm/go/by.web/id=505

horizpa.horizpar: Registered to tax lots. Street center lines were digitized from aerial orthophotography at +/- 10 feet accuracy. Tax lots were fit to the street centerlines. Beaverton, Oregon City and Tigard planning areas were improved to +/- 5 feet accuracy. Multnomah County was created with coordinate geometry using better control.

procstep.procdesc: Projection information (.prj file), compatible with ArcGIS 8.1, was added to the layer.
Data now maintained as a versioned feature class within an SDE geodatabase.
The sch_dist.shp has been renamed to school_district.shp.

School District Boundaries following the boundary between the states of Oregon and Washington were updated to precise state boundary line coordinates. The boundary between Oregon and Washington is defined by ORS 186.520 which lists latitude and longitude coordinate stations connected by a series of straight lines along length of the boundary.
Added ID fields that link to state and national databases: DistInstID - Oregon Dept. of Education district ID, and NCESDistID - National Center for Education Statistics district ID

enttyp.enttypd: Description of school district polygon attributes

attr.attrdef: National Center for Education Statistics district ID
Oregon Dept. of Education district ID

distinfo.distliab: The information in this file was derived from digital databases on Metro's GIS. Care was taken in the creation of this file. Metro cannot accept any responsibility for errors, omissions, or positional accuracy. There are no warranties, expressed or implied.

digtinfo.formname: Shapefile or ESRI geodatabase format. Hourly fee will be charged for conversion

onlinopt.accinstr: Most RLIS layers are available on the RLIS Discovery site. Email drc@oregonmetro.gov or call 503 797-1742 for further instructions.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
